title: Google’s ‘Switch to Android’ app for iOS might copy iCloud data to Google Photos
content:
Data migration and backup has never been Android’s strong suit. Even though data like SMS messages, Wi-Fi passwords, and other basic data can be backed up to a Google account, transferring most app data isn’t possible without third-party tools, and migrating from iOS to Android can also be difficult. However, there’s now more evidence that

The post Google’s ‘Switch to Android’ app for iOS might copy iCloud data to Google Photos appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google might be working on an update to its Data Transfer Tool that will make copying iCloud data to Android easier.
